name: ItsTheROI
tagline: The Art of SEO, The Science of PPC
description: ItsTheROI is a San Francisco Bay Area based Search Engine Marketing company that delivers sustainable, data driven strategies focused on Return On Investment.  Obtaining ROI requires creating conversions, events that happens at the intersection of user interface, content and search intent. Our approach to Search Engine Optimization and Pay Per Click advertising teaches organizations how to use data to learn about their customers — to listen to users and give them what they want.
